## sourceIndices() function

Returns the start and end index of a node in the CSS source string.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function sourceIndices(x: {
    tokens(): Array<CSSToken>;
} | Array<{
    tokens(): Array<CSSToken>;
}>): [number, number];
```
